Text: Master AgreementNonPrivilegedpst Here is the master that you wanted If you want me to do more on it just let me know Alisha

Cc Barry My name is Alisha Mahabir and I have been working on negotiating the MGIENA GISB I have been in contact with Lourdes Cervantes at MGI her phone number is There are still a few issues left to be resolved before we can proceed with the execution of this document Per Geral Nemecs request I will outline these changes as they are addressed in Exhibit B to the GISB that was sent over by Lourdes Initially I want to note that some changes must be made to the front page of the GISB MGI has previously agreed to allow ENA to be the confirming party under Section Additionally there have been a few problems with allowing payment to be made on the th day of the month It appears that MGI has been construing this provision broadly so as to make payment on the nd day of March after a short month in February Thus we would like Section to read th day or for the Month of February on the last day of the Month As for Exhibit B the changes are as follows The words or interruptible should be deleted from this provision The interruptible language conflicts with the ability to do day firm deals under this contract This provision deals with when notices are deemed received The provision as written provides that notice by first class mail is deemed received business days after mailing MGI would like to change this to allow for receipt to mean actual receipt Lourdes told me that she will check to see whether the change can be stricken or at least to extend business days to business days a MGI has agreed to strike the term letter from the requirement that the Parent issue a guarantee should doubt arise as to Enrons ability to pay b Originally the GISB provides that a contract can be terminated without prior notice should certain conditions be met MGI wants to change this to require the parties to provide hours notice Lourdes told me that she would check to see whether this could be changed to hours prior notice The language designating ICC is acceptable however any redundant language should be stricken If this memo is at all unclear please feel free to call me My extension is Alisha Mahabir

Cc Hi Jason and Veronica I have left messages with both of you regarding negotiations with Tenaska Marketing Ventures Basically they sent us language limiting any recourse that ENA Upstream might have against the personal assets of any partner officer director employee or stockholder of Tenaska We need to determine whether the company is secure enough for us to agree to this provision This is the only thing preventing us from signing this agreement and they are anxious to get it executed Please let me know as soon as is reasonably feasible Thanks Alisha Ext

GISB status Cc NonPrivilegedpst Hi Judy I just wanted to let you know that we have a few contracts that are close to completion Aquila has been sent for execution and MainLine should be sent over on Monday for us to execute Also BP Energy Sequent and Conoco are closed If you need anything else let me know Thanks Alisha
Data Sheet Check Cc NonPrivilegedpst Hi Kay I am sending this to you on behalf of Gerald Nemec If there are any problems you can contact me via email or at extension Alisha
Ormat Confidentiality AgreementNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Here is the final copy of the Confidentiality Agreement Alisha

Work LoadNonPrivilegedpst Hey Gerald I just wanted to update you on what I have been up to I have been working on a couple of small assignments for various lawyers and paralegals Steve Van Hooser brought me in on a big project that he is trying to wrap up The documents are to be executed tomorrow Despite the work that I have been given I dont feel that I have much to work on I have been stopping in offices asking for work but nobody wants me to work Any suggestions Alisha

Comments to AESENA Master AgreementScott Here are some of the comments that we have to the redline version of the Enfolio Master you sent us I will designate them by the section number they are assigned in the Master Also there are a few items that we are waiting on our credit department to resolve Initially I would like to clarify some of the basics of the agreement Do you anticipate being the buyer or the seller more often under this agreement Where is the delivery point All changes from Texas to New York law are acceptable Why do you want to strike the language and acknowledge that each Party will rely thereon in doing business related to the Transaction This change is acceptable We agree that the change from may to shall but dont agree to striking the reasonable time for reciept Would it be more acceptable to change this to Two Business Days This change is acceptable and We would like to hold off on these items until for now The changes in this section are acceptable save the last change which strikes the langauge dealing with affiliates We are waiting on credit to ensure that this last change is acceptable This language is not acceptable as we find the language already provided in the Master to be satisfactory The clause already makes reference to material representations Article You propose to take out the language limiting Force Majeure to days Is it your intention that Force Majeure can continue indefinetly If not what time period do you suggest Why do you want to take this section out Who will be responsible should new taxes be levied The first change in this paragraph as the Gas passes the receiving manifold is acceptable However the second change which allows the parties to take negligence into consideration in determining indemnity is not acceptable The first change is acceptable However the language disallowing the parties to transfer sell encumber or assign the Agreement for security purposes is unacceptable As for the obligation of a transferring party we agree that the parties should remain liable on contracts transferred to an affiliate of the company and for transactions which have not been completed However in all other scenarios the parties should not be liable These changes are unacceptable If you could explain your reasoning for the change perhaps we could reach some middle ground Would it be more to your liking to change the day requirement to days Could you explain your reasons for the deletion of the language in this section The first two sentences and the last sentence added by you are acceptable however the remaining portions are unacceptable If you have any questions regarding these comments please refer them to Debra Perlingeire Here telephone numer is and her email is Best regards Alisha Mahabir
Confirms Cc Hi John I am emailing you on behalf of Debra Would you please review the attached confirms and let her know if they are accurate Thanks Alisha

AmendmentJennifer per your discussion with myself and Debra Perlingiere here are the sentences that we would like to add to the amendment you sent us All capitalized terms used herein unless otherwise defined shall have the meanings given to them in the Base Agreement This First Amendment may be executed in counterparts each of which taken together shall consitute one and the same instrument Thanks so much for your patience and understanding on this matter Alisha

RE GISBI sent this over to the contact for review and have not heard back yet Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Wednesday October PM To Mahabir Alisha Subject FW GISB I think I have sent this to you please give me an update Original Message From Sonnonstine Max Sent Thursday October AM To Perlingiere Debra Dickson Stacy E Nemec Gerald Subject FW GISB Good Morning Enclosed is a draft of a GISB for Utility Resource Solutions LP They have done some small physical volumes secured by a prepay but are interested in establishing a more developed relationship As such they want to enter into a GISB with Enron This is their copy forwarded through Jay Reitmeyer Please review and advise what needs to be done if anything to get this executed Thanks Max Sonnonstine x

Cc Barry My name is Alisha Mahabir and I have been working on negotiating the MGIENA GISB I have been in contact with Lourdes Cervantes at MGI her phone number is There are still a few issues left to be resolved before we can proceed with the execution of this document Per Geral Nemecs request I will outline these changes as they are addressed in Exhibit B to the GISB that was sent over by Lourdes Initially I want to note that some changes must be made to the front page of the GISB MGI has previously agreed to allow ENA to be the confirming party under Section Additionally there have been a few problems with allowing payment to be made on the th day of the month It appears that MGI has been construing this provision broadly so as to make payment on the nd day of March after a short month in February Thus we would like Section to read th day or for the Month of February on the last day of the Month As for Exhibit B the changes are as follows The words or interruptible should be deleted from this provision The interruptible language conflicts with the ability to do day firm deals under this contract This provision deals with when notices are deemed received The provision as written provides that notice by first class mail is deemed received business days after mailing MGI would like to change this to allow for receipt to mean actual receipt Lourdes told me that she will check to see whether the change can be stricken or at least to extend business days to business days a MGI has agreed to strike the term letter from the requirement that the Parent issue a guarantee should doubt arise as to Enrons ability to pay b Originally the GISB provides that a contract can be terminated without prior notice should certain conditions be met MGI wants to change this to require the parties to provide hours notice Lourdes told me that she would check to see whether this could be changed to hours prior notice The language designating ICC is acceptable however any redundant language should be stricken If this memo is at all unclear please feel free to call me My extension is Alisha Mahabir
